name: Tomb Raider III: The Lost Artefact
description:
This script will install "Tomb Raider III: The Last Artefact" CD edition with support for modern resolution.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
dgvoodoo2:: http://www.dege.freeweb.hu/
Arsunt Patch FOV FMV Sunglasses: https://www.tombraiderforums.com/index.php
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes: - as "Tomb Raider III: The Lost Artefact" has insufficient controller support, I invite you to use a keymapper. You will find profiles for x360 (Antimicro) and Steam Controller (sc-controller) in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
content:
files:
- dgv: http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_55_4_1.zip
- arsunt: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%203/TR3_Arsunt_Patch_FOV_FMV_Sunglasses.zip
- menu1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%203/TR3M1.BAT
- menu2: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%203/TR3M2.BAT
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb Raider
    3/gamepad%20profiles/tr3_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb
    Raider 3/gamepad%20profiles/tr3_steam.sccprofile
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb
    Raider 3/gamepad%20profiles/tr3_gamepad_readme.html
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%203/tr3.bmp
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 3/TR3M1.BAT
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
